name: Pirate Booty
description:
Pirate Booty is a simple game that puts an eye patch on you so you can sail the gay seas looking for booty and an evil captain by the name of "Frankenfuter". Use the map to navigate your way though to The evil Fankenfuter. But Don't party too much or you will never make it out alive. You must go square by square and there is no going back although some place are too fun not to visit twice. Enjoy!

Made for the GaymerX's first Game Jam jan. 11th, 2015.
